1370: Scilla was born in Bloemendaelse straet in 1370.
Got married to Ghisebrecht at age 24 in 1370.
Gave birth to Gelmarus in 1370 at age 24.
1371: Gave birth to Franco in 1371 at age 25.
1373: Gave birth to Uergina in 1373 at age 27.
1375: Gave birth to Esa in 1375 at age 29.
Lost son Gelmarus when Gelmarus was 6 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Aleydis in 1378 at age 32.
1379: Gave birth to Jonghen in 1379 at age 33.
1380: Lost daughter Aleydis when Aleydis was 3 years old.
1381: Lost son Jonghen when Jonghen was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1386: Lost daughter Esa when Esa was 12 years old.
